name: A Heist with Robot
description:
You are a thief that steals a very valuable new robot, but to run away from the law you have to use your new companion.

Hello, This is my second game  ever I actually completed and my first game jam game, so don't have high expectations and also there might be some bugs especially with the camera.

WARNING: In the flying section don't go into the space between the two buildings, because it will glitch your game.
